short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Turn your research into good deeds.
short.fr: Transforme tes recherches en bonnes actions.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_U:
YouCare Pro allows you to carry out good deeds thanks to your searches on Google. In the organizational links you will find a button allowing you to visualize the partner sites which make it possible to finance the good actions. If you make a purchase on one of these sites, they donate commissions to YouCare so that we can fund good deeds.

If you click on the YouCare icon you can directly launch a search on YouCare Search too. Thanks to the YouCare Search Engine you can help to finance good deeds with your search.
long.da,de,es,fi,it,ja,ko,nl,no,pl,ru,sv,tr:
YouCare Lite allows you to carry out good deeds thanks to your searches on Google. In the organizational links you will find a button allowing you to visualize the partner sites which make it possible to finance the good actions. If you make a purchase on one of these sites, they donate commissions to YouCare so that we can fund good deeds.

If you click on the YouCare icon you can directly launch a search on YouCare Search too. Thanks to the YouCare Search Engine you can help to finance good deeds with your search.
long.fr:
YouCare Pro te permet de réaliser des bonnes actions grâce à vos recherches sur Google ou Bing. Tu peux choisir parmi 8 bonnes actions et changer à tout moment. Grâce au compteur tu peux aussi suivre ta progression.

Dans les résultats de recherche tu trouveras un bouton te permettant de visualiser les sites partenaires qui permettent de financer les bonnes actions. Si tu effectues un achat sur l'un de ces sites, ils reversent des commissions à YouCare afin que nous puissions financer de bonnes actions.
